metadata.title: CVE-2022-24963 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS for NVIDIA BlueField (jammy) - medium
metadata.description:
Integer Overflow or Wraparound vulnerability in apr_encode functions ofApache Portable Runtime (APR) allows an attacker to write beyond bounds ofa buffer. This issue affects Apache Portable Runtime (APR) version 1.7.0.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-24963` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libapr1 - 1.7.0-8ubuntu0.22.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: apr package in jammy was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.7.0-8ubuntu0.22.04.1').
